languages.text: "Страх. В твоих словах я слышу лишь страх. Он заставил тебя уверовать, что одной Его благодати нам не хватит, чтобы устоять перед приливом тьмы. Он убедил тебя искать спасения в пучине мерзости ксеносов. Ты — не страж Империума, просто старый жадный трус".

"Fear. I hear nothing but fear in your words. It was fear that made you believe that His grace alone is not enough to stand against the rising tide of darkness. It was fear that convinced you to seek salvation in the abyss of xenos filth. You are no guardian of the Imperium. You are just a greedy old coward."
languages.original_text: "Страх. В твоих словах я слышу лишь страх. Он заставил тебя уверовать, что одной Его благодати нам не хватит, чтобы устоять перед приливом тьмы. Он убедил тебя искать спасения в пучине мерзости ксеносов. Ты — не страж Империума, просто старый жадный трус".

languages.text: «Miedo. Sus palabras solo encierran miedo. Fue por miedo que llegó a creer que Su gracia no basta para hacer frente a la oscuridad. Fue el miedo lo que le convenció para buscar la salvación en las inmundicias xenos. No es un guardián del Imperium, sino un cobarde viejo y avaricioso».
languages.original_text: "Fear. I hear nothing but fear in your words. It was fear that made you believe that His grace alone is not enough to stand against the rising tide of darkness. It was fear that convinced you to seek salvation in the abyss of xenos filth. You are no guardian of the Imperium. You are just a greedy old coward."

traits.locale_text: «Miedo. Sus palabras solo encierran miedo. Fue por miedo que llegó a creer que Su gracia no basta para hacer frente a la oscuridad. Fue el miedo lo que le convenció para buscar la salvación en las inmundicias xenos. No es un guardián del Imperium, sino un cobarde viejo y avaricioso».

languages.text: 「恐怖。あなたの言葉からは恐怖しか聞こえません。主の恩寵だけでは、押し寄せる闇の波に立ち向かうには不十分だと信じ込ませたのは恐怖だった。異種族の穢れの淵に救いを求めることを確信させたのも恐怖だった。あなたは帝国のガーディアンではありません。ただの貪欲な臆病者です」
languages.original_text: "Fear. I hear nothing but fear in your words. It was fear that made you believe that His grace alone is not enough to stand against the rising tide of darkness. It was fear that convinced you to seek salvation in the abyss of xenos filth. You are no guardian of the Imperium. You are just a greedy old coward."

traits.locale_text: 「恐怖。あなたの言葉からは恐怖しか聞こえません。主の恩寵だけでは、押し寄せる闇の波に立ち向かうには不十分だと信じ込ませたのは恐怖だった。異種族の穢れの淵に救いを求めることを確信させたのも恐怖だった。あなたは帝国のガーディアンではありません。ただの貪欲な臆病者です」

languages.text: “恐惧，我从你的话里只听到了恐惧。正是出于恐惧，你才以为单靠祂的恩典不足以抵挡涌动的黑暗；正是出于恐惧，你才会在异形污秽的深渊中寻求救赎。你并不是帝国的守护者，你只是个贪婪的老懦夫而已。”
languages.original_text: "Fear. I hear nothing but fear in your words. It was fear that made you believe that His grace alone is not enough to stand against the rising tide of darkness. It was fear that convinced you to seek salvation in the abyss of xenos filth. You are no guardian of the Imperium. You are just a greedy old coward."

traits.locale_text: “恐惧，我从你的话里只听到了恐惧。正是出于恐惧，你才以为单靠祂的恩典不足以抵挡涌动的黑暗；正是出于恐惧，你才会在异形污秽的深渊中寻求救赎。你并不是帝国的守护者，你只是个贪婪的老懦夫而已。”

languages.text: "Angst. Ich höre nichts als Angst in Euren Worten. Angst hat Euch glauben lassen, dass Seine Gunst nicht ausreicht, um gegen die steigende Flut der Dunkelheit zu bestehen. Angst hat Euch dazu gebracht, Erlösung im Abgrund des Xenos-Schmutzes zu suchen. Ihr beschützt das Imperium nicht. Ihr seid nur ein gieriger alter Feigling."
languages.original_text: "Fear. I hear nothing but fear in your words. It was fear that made you believe that His grace alone is not enough to stand against the rising tide of darkness. It was fear that convinced you to seek salvation in the abyss of xenos filth. You are no guardian of the Imperium. You are just a greedy old coward."

traits.locale_text: "Angst. Ich höre nichts als Angst in Euren Worten. Angst hat Euch glauben lassen, dass Seine Gunst nicht ausreicht, um gegen die steigende Flut der Dunkelheit zu bestehen. Angst hat Euch dazu gebracht, Erlösung im Abgrund des Xenos-Schmutzes zu suchen. Ihr beschützt das Imperium nicht. Ihr seid nur ein gieriger alter Feigling."

languages.text: « La peur. Voilà tout ce qui transparaît dans vos propos. C'est la peur qui vous a poussé à croire que Sa seule grâce ne suffisait pas à résister à la déferlante des ténèbres. C'est encore la peur qui vous a incité à chercher le salut dans les abysses de la corruption xénos. Vous n'êtes pas un gardien de l'Imperium, juste un vieillard avide et lâche. »
languages.original_text: "Fear. I hear nothing but fear in your words. It was fear that made you believe that His grace alone is not enough to stand against the rising tide of darkness. It was fear that convinced you to seek salvation in the abyss of xenos filth. You are no guardian of the Imperium. You are just a greedy old coward."

C'est encore la peur qui vous a incité à chercher le salut dans les abysses de la corruption xénos. Vous n'êtes pas un gardien de l'Imperium, juste un vieillard avide et lâche. »

languages.text: "Korku... Sözlerinde korkudan başka bir şey işitmiyorum. Seni mütemadiyen yayılan karanlığın karşısına dikilmeye O'nun lütfunun yetmeyeceğine inandıran korkuydu. Seni zeno pisliklerinin cehenneminde kurtuluşun peşine düşmeye ikna eden korkuydu. Sen İmparatorluk'un muhafızı değilsin ihtiyar. Yalnızca tamahkâr bir korkaktan ibaretsin."
languages.original_text: "Fear. I hear nothing but fear in your words. It was fear that made you believe that His grace alone is not enough to stand against the rising tide of darkness. It was fear that convinced you to seek salvation in the abyss of xenos filth. You are no guardian of the Imperium. You are just a greedy old coward."
